description.english: Deliberately induce hyperspace shock, burning your Tiddlets alive
description.german: Löse absichtlich einen Hyperraumschock aus und verbrenne deine Tiddlets bei lebendigem Leibe
description.french: Provoquez délibérément un choc d'hyperespace, brûlant vos tiddlets vifs
description.italian: Induci deliberatamente uno shock iperspaziale, bruciando vivi i tuoi tiddlets
description.koreana: 고의로 초공간 쇼크를 유발하여 티들렛을 산 채로 불태우세요
description.spanish: Provoca deliberadamente un choque hiperespacial, quemando vivos a tus tiddlets
description.schinese: 故意引发超空间冲击，将你的特德利活活烧死
description.tchinese: 故意引發超空間衝擊，將你的特德利活活燒死
description.russian: Намеренно вызовите гиперпространственный шок, сжигая тиддлетов заживо
description.japanese: 意図的にハイパースペースショックを誘発し、ティドレットを生きたまま焼き殺す
description.portuguese: Induza deliberadamente o choque do hiperespaço, queimando os seus Tiddlets vivos
description.polish: Celowo wywołaj wstrząs nadprzestrzenny, paląc tiddlety żywcem
description.dutch: Veroorzaak opzettelijk een hyperruimteschok, waarbij je je Tiddlets levend verbrandt
description.norwegian: Fremkall bevisst hyperromsjokk og brenn tiddletene dine levende
description.swedish: Framkalla avsiktligt hyperrymdschock och bränn dina tiddlets levande
description.turkish: Kasten hiperuzay şoku yaratarak Tiddletlarını canlı canlı yak
description.brazilian: Induza deliberadamente o choque do hiperespaço, queimando seus Tiddlets vivos
description.greek: Προκαλέστε σκόπιμα σοκ υπερχώρου, καίγοντας ζωντανά τα Tiddlets σας
description.latam: Provoca deliberadamente un choque hiperespacial, quemando vivos a tus tiddlets

description.english: Destroy an enemy ship with Combat Rank 5 or above
description.german: Zerstöre ein feindliches Schiff mit Kampfrang 5 oder höher
description.french: Détruisez un vaisseau ennemi de rang de combat 5 ou supérieur
description.italian: Distruggi una nave nemica con Grado di Combattimento 5 o superiore
description.koreana: 전투 등급 5 이상의 적 함선을 파괴하세요
description.spanish: Destruye una nave enemiga con rango de combate 5 o superior
description.schinese: 摧毁一艘战斗等级 5 或以上的敌舰
description.tchinese: 摧毀一艘戰鬥等級 5 或以上的敵艦

description.japanese: 戦闘ランク5以上の敵船を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destrua uma nave inimiga com Classificação de Combate 5 ou superior
description.polish: Zniszcz wrogi statek o randze bojowej 5 lub wyższej
description.dutch: Vernietig een vijandelijk schip met Combat Rank 5 of hoger
description.norwegian: Ødelegg et fiendtlig skip med kamprangering 5 eller høyere
description.swedish: Förstör ett fiendeskepp med stridsrankning 5 eller högre
description.turkish: Savaş Rütbesi 5 veya üzeri olan bir düşman gemisini yok et

description.greek: Καταστρέψτε ένα εχθρικό πλοίο με Combat Rank 5 ή παραπάνω

displayName.japanese: スピーディ・スターゲート

description.english: Complete the Stargate Project in less than six hours
description.german: Schließe das Sternentor-Projekt in weniger als sechs Stunden ab
description.french: Terminez le projet Porte des Étoiles en moins de six heures
description.italian: Completa il Progetto Stargate in meno di sei ore
description.spanish: Completa el Proyecto Stargate en menos de seis horas
description.schinese: 在六小时内完成星际之门项目
description.tchinese: 在六小時內完成星際之門項目
description.russian: Завершите проект «Звездные врата» менее чем за шесть часов
description.japanese: スターゲート・プロジェクトを6時間以内に完了する
description.portuguese: Conclua o Projeto Stargate em menos de seis horas
description.polish: Ukończ Projekt Gwiezdne Wrota w mniej niż sześć godzin
description.dutch: Voltooi het Stargate-project in minder dan zes uur
description.norwegian: Fullfør Stargate-prosjektet på under seks timer
description.swedish: Slutför Stargate-projektet på mindre än sex timmar
description.turkish: Yıldız Geçidi Projesi'ni altı saatten kısa sürede tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua o Projeto Stargate em menos de seis horas
description.greek: Ολοκληρώστε το Stargate Project σε λιγότερο από έξι ώρες
description.latam: Completa el Proyecto Stargate en menos de seis horas

description.english: Destroy a Fortress in the undiscovered sector
description.german: Zerstöre eine Festung im unentdeckten Sektor
description.french: Détruisez une forteresse dans le secteur inconnu
description.italian: Distruggi una fortezza nel settore inesplorato
description.spanish: Destruye una fortaleza en el sector inexplorado
description.schinese: 摧毁未发现星区中的一座堡垒
description.tchinese: 摧毀未發現星區中的一座堡壘
description.japanese: 未発見のセクターにある要塞を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destrua uma Fortaleza no setor desconhecido
description.polish: Zniszcz fortecę w nieodkrytym sektorze
description.dutch: Vernietig een fort in de onontdekte sector
description.norwegian: Ødelegg en festning i den uoppdagede sektoren
description.swedish: Förstör en fästning i den oupptäckta sektorn
description.turkish: Keşfedilmemiş sektördeki bir kaleyi yok et
description.brazilian: Destrua uma Fortaleza no setor desconhecido
description.greek: Καταστρέψτε ένα Φρούριο στον ανεξερεύνητο τομέα
description.latam: Destruye una fortaleza en el sector inexplorado

description.english: Rescue a ship under attack, and welcome them into your fleet
description.german: Rette ein Schiff unter Angriff und heiße es in deiner Flotte willkommen
description.french: Sauvez un vaisseau attaqué et accueillez-le dans votre flotte
description.italian: Salva una nave sotto attacco e accoglila nella tua flotta
description.spanish: Rescata una nave bajo ataque y dales la bienvenida a tu flota
description.schinese: 营救一艘遭到攻击的船只，并欢迎他们加入你的舰队
description.tchinese: 營救一艘遭到攻擊的船隻，並歡迎他們加入你的艦隊
description.russian: Спасите корабль, подвергшийся нападению, и примите его в свой флот
description.japanese: 攻撃を受けている船を救出し、艦隊に迎え入れる
description.portuguese: Resgate uma nave sob ataque e dê as boas-vindas à sua frota
description.polish: Uratuj zaatakowany statek i powitaj go w swojej flocie
description.dutch: Red een schip dat wordt aangevallen en verwelkom het in je vloot
description.norwegian: Redd et skip under angrep og ønsk dem velkommen inn i flåten din
description.swedish: Rädda ett skepp under attack och välkomna dem till din flotta
description.turkish: Saldırı altındaki bir gemiyi kurtar ve onu filona dahil et
description.brazilian: Resgate uma nave sob ataque e dê as boas-vindas à sua frota
description.greek: Διασώστε ένα πλοίο που δέχεται επίθεση και καλωσορίστε το στον στόλο σας
description.latam: Rescata una nave bajo ataque y dales la bienvenida a tu flota

description.english: Destroy all hostiles in the sector
description.french: Détruisez tous les hostiles du secteur
description.italian: Distruggi tutti i nemici nel settore
description.koreana: 섹터 내의 모든 적대 세력을 파괴하세요
description.spanish: Destruye a todos los hostiles del sector
description.schinese: 消灭该星区内的所有敌对目标
description.tchinese: 消滅該星區內的所有敵對目標
description.japanese: セクター内のすべての敵対勢力を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destrua todos os hostis no setor
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie wrogie jednostki w sektorze
description.dutch: Vernietig alle vijandige eenheden in de sector
description.turkish: Sektördeki tüm düşman birimlerini yok et
description.brazilian: Destrua todos os hostis no setor
description.greek: Καταστρέψτε όλες τις εχθρικές μονάδες στον τομέα
description.latam: Destruye a todos los hostiles del sector

description.english: Travel through hyperspace inside the Void, and live to tell the tale
description.german: Reise durch den Hyperraum innerhalb der Leere und überlebe, um davon zu berichten
description.french: Voyagez en hyperespace à l'intérieur du néant et survivez pour raconter votre périple
description.italian: Viaggia attraverso l'iperspazio dentro il vuoto e vivi per raccontarlo
description.koreana: 보이드 내부에서 초공간 여행을 하고 살아남아 전설이 되세요
description.spanish: Viaja por el hiperespacio dentro del vacío y vive para contarlo
description.schinese: 在虚空内部进行超空间旅行，并活着回来讲述这段经历
description.tchinese: 在虛空內部進行超空間旅行，並活著回來講述這段經歷
description.russian: Совершите гиперпространственное путешествие внутри пустоты и выживите, чтобы рассказать об этом
description.japanese: ヴォイド内のハイパースペースを旅し、生還する
description.portuguese: Viaje pelo hiperespaço dentro do Vazio e sobreviva para contar a história
description.polish: Podróżuj przez nadprzestrzeń wewnątrz Pustki i przeżyj, by o tym opowiedzieć
description.dutch: Reis door de hyperruimte binnen de leegte en overleef om het te vertellen
description.norwegian: Reis gjennom hyperrommet inne i tomrommet, og lev for å fortelle om det
description.swedish: Res genom hyperrymden inuti tomrummet och överlev för att berätta om det
description.turkish: Boşluğun içindeki hiperuzayda seyahat et ve bunu anlatacak kadar hayatta kal
description.brazilian: Viaje pelo hiperespaço dentro do Vazio e sobreviva para contar a história
description.greek: Ταξιδέψτε μέσω του υπερχώρου μέσα στο Κενό και ζήστε για να το διηγηθείτε
description.latam: Viaja por el hiperespacio dentro del vacío y vive para contarlo
